data.title: Birth of the Ultimate Majin!
data.meta_description: Birth of the Ultimate Majin! is a 7-star difficulty Parallel Quest in Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2. Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2 PQ No.: 113 Previous: Advent of the Mighty God Zamasu! Next: The Majin Revival Plan Majin Buu has absorbed Gohan and created an army of clones to test his newfound power...
data.text:
Birth of the Ultimate Majin! is a 7-star difficulty Parallel Quest in Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2.

Games[]

Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2

Dragon Ball: Xenoverse 2[]

Level Information[]

PQ No.: 113

Previous: Advent of the Mighty God Zamasu!

Next: The Majin Revival Plan

Plot[]

Majin Buu has absorbed Gohan and created an army of clones to test his newfound power! Fight alongside Buu to take them all down!

Win Conditions[]

Defeat all enemies

Clear with Majin Buu (Gohan Abs.)'s HP over 50%

Defeat all Majin Buus

Lose Conditions[]

All team HP depleted

Time expires

Basic Reward[]

4,280 Zeni

All-Energy Capsule Z

I'll make good use of you!

I'm stronger than ever now!

Super Ghost Buu Attack

Candy Beam

Majin Buu (Gohan Absorbed)
